CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Logo_Shape__c, 'Rectangle'), IMAGE(PDF_Logo_URL__c, "Rectangle", 100, 200), If(ISPICKVAL(Logo_Shape__c, 'Long Rectangle'), IMAGE(PDF_Logo_URL__c, "Long Rectangle", 50, 250), If(ISPICKVAL(Logo_Shape__c, 'Square'), IMAGE(PDF_Logo_URL__c, "Square", 200, 200), IMAGE(PDF_Logo_URL__c, "Small Square", 100, 100))))
CustomField.label: Edition Logo
